summary: Just a normal follower, goes with the elvish follower look.
descriptionHtml:
New Elven follower, His name is Erestor, has the complete elven armor, included with an elven bow and arrows. He is not overpowered, will match your level then level up with you.

Requirements: Need ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii to be able to get Erestors hair.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Location: He is located in Riverwood, inside of the sleeping giant inn. Just teleport there if you are lazy like me. (coc riverwoodsleepinggiantinn)

Install: Use NMM or just drop in the data file and go.
Uninstall: Just delete the data file, or take off with NMM.

Also, if you like, endorse,  any questions, just comment.

Credits: Thank you Bethesda for the great game and creation kit.
author: Manuel3593
